Package Algorithm

Class AutoMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithm.AutoMode
  • public final class AutoMode
extends java.lang.Object
    AutoMode is a class to play the game alone, built using Dijkstra algorithm. The algorithm calculates the best possible move for the current position.

      • Obstructed

        public static boolean Obstructed​(Point3D point1,
                                 Point3D point2)
        Check if the path is obstructed between two points using the Bresenham algorithm.
        Parameters:
        point1 - pixel 1
        point2 - pixel 2
        Returns:
        true if blocked, false if clear.
